mapper.sql: a.userid AS "userid", a.name AS "name", a.loginid AS "loginid", a.password AS "password", a.admin AS "admin", a.usertype AS "usertype", a.deptid AS "deptid", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO crm_user( userid, name, loginid, password, admin, usertype, deptid, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{userid}, #{name}, #{loginid}, #{password}, #{admin}, #{usertype}, #{deptid}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE crm_user SET userid = #{userid}, name = #{name}, loginid = #{loginid}, password = #{password}, admin = #{admin}, usertype = #{usertype}, deptid = #{deptid}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
